select id , parent_id , path , component , icon , name , title , description , order_num , created_time , updated_time , created_by , updated_by from iot_sys_menu a where id in (select t3.menu_id from users t1 join user_role_relation t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id join role_menu_relation t3 on t2.role_id = t3.role_id where username = #{username}) group by id , parent_id , path , component , icon , name , title , description , order_num , created_time , updated_time , created_by , updated_by order by order_num

select id , parent_id , path , component , icon , name , title , description , order_num , created_time , updated_time , created_by , updated_by from iot_sys_menu a where id in (select menu_id from role_menu_relation where role_id = #{roleId}) group by id , parent_id , path , component , icon , name , title , description , order_num , created_time , updated_time , created_by , updated_by order by order_num
